Text.Page:
So far, , you've hurt the gulas, but we need to limit their power.

That means hitting the {@LinkCreature:8#3041#gula overseers} and the {@LinkCreature:8#3042#kobold thugs}. Anything that fits into their shackles becomes a slave and slavery's where they make their gold.

These ledgers...they're a trove of information!

Business partners, slave families who've been split up...everything's in here!

I'm sending this onward to high command. Well done!
If we keep them from collecting slaves, we keep them from selling slaves. It's that simple.
